name: Rocket Rush (itch)
description:
🚨🚨🚨 BE WARNED 🚨🚨🚨

Rocket hush is not like other "SIMPLE" platformer game. Its hard, difficult and challenging.
Play it at your own risk. 💀
Don't believe us try it for yourself.☠️

Rocket rush is a new 2020 game.In this game you play is lil devil whose son has been kidnap by Evil demons 👿. Your mission is to rescue him. Play through 95 action-pack unique levels. Solving puzzles , Avoiding obstacles and battling Monster bosses in order to save your son.

🎉How to play:🎉

Jump - Over obstacles
Run - from enemies 🐙
Shoot -to kill enemies 💥
Fly and dodge attacks 🔥

Jump,Run,shoot,Fly,dodge attacks

Rocket Rush- 2020 is a puzzle action adventure platformer mobile game.
Rocket Rush is not a simple puzzle/runner platformer game. Its hard , difficult and challenging play it your own risk

In this game if you dont move you will be a dead target.

⭐⭐⭐🔥 FEATURES 🔥⭐⭐⭐

😍★ 95 UNIQUE LEVELS: Each level is unique and different from each other. Every Level has a unique puzzle. Complete all of the
levels to get to the end of Rocket Rush.

😆★ EXCITING GAMEPLAY :Tons of different obstacles and traps to get around: Robots 🤖,killer chickens 🐓, bombs
💣, Monster bosses 🐙💀...And lots of spikes🔱and lava 🌋.

😱★ BOSS FIGHTS: Fight multiple unique bosses in order to get to the end and rescue baby devil from all the Evil monsters.🐙💀

😍 ★FANTASTIC VISUALS: Gorgeous Beautiful HD graphics.

😘★ UNLOCKING CHARACTERS: Players can unlock multiple characters and heroic runner outfits. Dashing!.Rocket Spin

😲★ SPECIAL EVENTS: Earn awesome rewards everyday.💰

Players who love platformer games , action adventure games and difficult puzzling levels will enjoy this game.Rocket rush is also a free offline game 2020.

❗PLAY FOR FREE❗

❗Don't Rush! Otherwise you will be trapped❗

Rocket rush is also one of the free game 2020 you can find in new puzzle adventure games 2020.

A game made with love by Indie Developers and lots of sleepless nights. We are receptive to your feedback.
Thank you for playing this game.
